name: AIFASmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Air conditioner”
”Alexa, set Air conditioner temperature to 25 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the AIFA Smart skill you can now interact with your AIFA Smart devices like i-Ctrl Pro.
To use this skill you need an AIFA Smart account. To register an account please download the AIFA Smart App from Google Play or App Store.
You need to set up your i-Ctrl Pro device in the AIFA Smart App before you can use it with this skill.

Through i-Ctrl Pro the current skill can control the following devices:
-TV (on/off, volume, channel)
-SetTopBox (on/off, volume, channel)
-DVD&Blu-ray players (on/off)
-Stereos&Amplifiers (on/off)
-Fan (on/off)
-Light (on/off)
-Air conditioner (on/off, temperature, mode)
-Vacuum Cleaner (on/off)
-Learned device (on/off)

Note: To use this skill, you need an i-Ctrl Pro IR blaster device.
